name: Massage Chair Simulator
description:
Developed by @The Gecko, @HummusMakesBread, and Hadi J 

This is our submission for Winter MelonJam 2022! It's the first time Hadi and @HummusMakesBread have competed in a game jam, and the first time they've ever made a game! While @The_Gecko has made a couple of games before, she has never made a rhythm game (and hardly plays them too). Regardless of the little sleep, we had a lot of fun making this game! It may not be amazing, but we hope you enjoy it anyways :D

Credits

Hadi J:

  • All of the graphics!
  • It was his first time taking digital art seriously and not fooling around with photos of our cat, and his first time animating too
  • Gameplay idea

@HummusMakesBread:

  • All of the menu/options screens (difficulty screen, instructions, etc). It was his first time using Godot :D
  • Made the thumbnail 
  • Music hunting!
  • Game idea

@The_Gecko:

  • Gameplay code and putting everything together
  • Music hunting playing the level 3 music on repeat
  • Gameplay idea

Song/SFX links (none of the music or sounds were made by us): 

  • https://opengameart.org/content/snowland-town
  • https://opengameart.org/content/fast-fight-battle-music-looped
  • https://opengameart.org/content/pulsar-famitracker-2a03
  • https://opengameart.org/content/bad-sound-1
